value: It was just another normal day on Planet Earth. It was a beautiful normal day like any other, Vini was living his normal life, he still hadn't showered, and he was talking to his friend Yasmin through Discord. It was a simple super decisive conversation for her to finally pay the X-Tudo Vini wanted so much. Vini was very happy, as he had been waiting for this day for several months, so this was the decisive magic moment. Everything was extremely quiet. It was just a silly Discord conversation like any other day.
Yasmin then looked at the monitor impatiently, and just wanted to get this story over with, so he wouldn't need to talk about X-Tudo anymore.
ah! Ready! I finally got my credit card working! I'm going to buy your X-Tudo now! Now it's time to stop this silly nonsense time!
Yes! Yeees Yasmin!!!
You've messed up the entire online casino! Don't think this will happen again!
Yasmin would then sigh deeply and slowly calm down when she realized that everything was finally solved. She was very thoughtful observing the whole situation before confirming the order

Uff...Okay... I sent your order just the way you asked. The delivery man of food app is already on his way to your house. I recommend you keep an eye on the GPS, or the delivery boy will pass right by.
Wow, my address isn't right? Motoca is going to screw up my X-Tudo!
Ah Vini! Nope nope! You sent the address! You're going to receive your X-Tudo!
Right now Vini's phone started beeping Food App Notifications.
Oh yes, man!
Heh! Let me see my phone beeped here.
Vini anxiously raises his hand and takes the phone, after unlocking it with his finger he looks at the notifications
Vini saw the notification that the delivery boy was about to arrive, his cell phone already asking him to go to the door of his house to wait for the delivery boy
so? He is coming?
Yasmin spoke giving a silly little laugh.
I want you to take the phone with you, I left a reminder in App Food about a little surprise for you when the order arrives.
Surprised Vini speaks in a curious way.
What the hell? What would that be?
Okay, let me enter the call on my cell, HOLD IT!!!!!!!!!!
Yasmin laughs harder before answering.
Relax siily Vini... you'll find out. Please... Just don't screw it all up. Mainly the phone!
Meanwhile, Vini began to hear the noise of the motorcycle.
Okay okay! Let me go see the gate. YES!
Vini then got up from his computer. He was home alone. He then went to the gate to open it to receive the food. Meanwhile Yasmin kept laughing and answering.
Don't worry, the surprise will be all good like your X-Tudo.
Vini then met with the delivery boy, already looking a bit confused about what Yasmin was talking about.
Hello... good afternoon sir, are you Vinicius?
Look there! Go mess up the delivery boy again!
Yasmin reply with a silly giggle.
Vini was wanting to speed up and get back to his room soon before the delivery boy could hear Yasmin laughing
Oops good afternoon, it's me yes, is it the snack?
Oops... yes, Your lunch... An X-Tudo. Everything and a little more...
Delivery Boy tried to react naturally when he noticed a kind of anxiety in Vini.
This burger was vibrating inside my motocycle, so please, if there's something wrong with your lunch, let me know that we'll exchange your lunch for a new one.
Delivery Boy delivered the X-Tudo box kindly to you.
The burger has arrived! Finally arrived!
Yasmin continued the silly giggles, happy to see Vini's reaction.
it's a joke, right? prank right? What is this vibration?
Vini reply with a surprised face and mischievousness.
Delivery Boy looked a little awkwardly, not knowing what to say.

Yes.... I saw...vibrating. Sorry for the expression, it was a quick word. Ah! Please! Just get it soon! It could be anything, maybe something inside the burguer, you'll need to check it out to see what it is.
...Okay can i open it now before you leave?
feel free... Just don't delay please. I'm getting late.
Yasmin kept laughing and trying to talk to Vini.
Then? Where's X-Tudo? We need to see the surprise together to be more fun!
Calm down Yasmin, the guy said there's some stuff vibrating here and I'll show you on cam.
Vini opens the box slowly. Afraid about what was inside the box. Vini see an X-Tudo, very big, just the way he wanted, twice the size that was in the photo.
Everything seems normal to me... Ah! It must have been a mistake, maybe it was the bike that was vibrating and I didn't notice. Sorry there bro!
well... I have to leave now, don't forget to give me 5 stars, thanks.
The Delivery Boy, without thinking twice, was already leaving.
Are you kidding me? What was this thing vibrating?
Yasmin then kept laughing until she heard Vini talking.
Vibrating? What?! Oh silly Vini! Don't make up jokes! Haven't you noticed the surprise yet?
Vini was extremely confused. Trying to understand what was going on. Trying not to think about what he was thinking.
Yasmin, did you tell the delivery boy to do this prank on me? WHY?!
Prank? What?! Don't tell me you haven't figured out what the surprise is yet!
Vini enters and goes to the kitchen to get a plate and goes back to the bedroom. The X-Tudo mysteriously started to vibrate a little on the table
Fuck, this fuck is alive...
Vini approaches X-Tudo and will analyze the burguer carefully.
Live? Vini! What did you do with X-Tudo? Haven't you noticed the obvious yet?
When Vini tried to analyze X-Tudo, he felt a kind of blue light, but X-Tudo didn't want to be opened completely at all, it just vibrated more with each touch it received.
Yasmin, there's some stuff coming out of X-Tudo.
Vini looked at the X-Tudo and tried harder to open it.
Coming out of X-Tudo? What are you talking about! I only ordered a double size!

The X-Tudo vibrated more and more, and the light started to get stronger, but Vini was starting to realize that he was making progress, and that he just needed to do a little more force, as he accidentally spilled some parts of the X-Tudo on the table because of the vibration.
N..Noo! My house! Wait, I'm looking at what's inside the X-Tudo, everything and a little more, hold it there.
Vini... You're scaring me. What's happening there?
Vini still keeps trying to force against the burguer, feeling extremely difficult to keep trying this again and again.
While more Vini tried, but the light got stronger, and X-Tudo vibrated extremely hard, spilling all parts of X-Tudo all over the kitchen, making a loud noise on the table because of the vibration
NO NO NOOO! MY HOUSE!
V...Vini? Are you okay? It's for eating X-Tudo! It's not to mess up the X-Tudo! What are you doing?!

Yasmin started talking in a worried voice. Then Vini finally manages to open X-Tudo, making all the rest of X-Tudo fly all over the place, he soon realizes what he was pulling inside X-Tudo, in fact it was a kind of bracelet, which quickly attaches to the his arm, but in the middle of it all comes a very bright light that takes over the whole kitchen.
W..What?! What is this Vini? Did the restaurant give you any SmartWatch as a gift?!
Stop kidding! I need help! What is happening?! W...What fuck?! My house will explode!
The glow then started to behave like a black hole, trying to pull Vini into it.
No, no! NO! This is IMPOSSIBLE! Damn Jasmin it happened, I don't know, your X-Tudo blew up and it's sucking me, this shit stuck on my arm, I'm going to turn the Men 10!!!!
Oh my god! I'll call the police!

Vini was in the last seconds of his presence before the black hole sucked him in completely, and suddenly he disappeared along with his phone, which was increasingly losing signal as he went deeper into the mysterious black hole.
Vini?! C.......of.........you....O... ...What's happening?! V...Vini! The sign! Signal is horrible! N...Nooo! Came back here! V....Viiiiini!
and the signal was completely lost and the Discord connection dropped while Vini continued to be sucked deeper into the black hole
Yasmin what did you do?! NOOO!
Then suddenly everything went blank, and Vini's consciousness was temporarily lost for an unknown period of time.

After a long time, Vini was in another mysterious place, his phone was with him, it was a beautiful day, the morning was starting, another normal day on the place, everything was very calm, the beach was deserted as usual because of the schedule. And mysteriously Vini wakes up on the beach, lost not knowing why he was there.
Damn man, what happened? I was talking to Yasmin and suddenly... X-TUUUUUUUDO!!! What the fuck happened...

Vini look at he arm curiously. Soon Vini noticed that everything was very different with his body when he felt the shape of his body. Instead of him seeing hands, he saw pony paws, while the calm water of the beach continued to calmly move on the sand.
What the... fuck... am I a horse?... a pony? I don't know...
Vini try to calm down and I see around me what is happening and I see the phone and I try to move.
I can't touch the phone because I don't have a FINGER!!! but I see there's something on my back, it's wings!!!!!!! WHAT'S HAPPENING HERE?!

So Vini try to use the wings to poke the phone screen. The phone turned on the screen and when the face detector felt the presence of Vini eyes, and all Vini saw was just the screen locked, and the phone was completely out of signal. No 4G, no Wi-Fi, no internet connection.
Oooh okay...

Vini was sad and hopeless. He didn't know what else could be done in that moment now. Suddenly Vini starts to hear the sound of footsteps approaching from the opposite direction to him, coming slowly, making him look back curiously.
Vini see a silhouette of another pony slowly approaching, thinking to do contact with you, and it gets closer and closer.
W...what? O..Oh no.... Oh, okay then I'll wait...
Vini was scared, but he just accepted the fate of waiting for the mysterious earth pony to approach him.
oh...it's not possible... It's...Is that what I'm really seeing? Did another new pony appear? Are you new around here?
The mysterious pony looked a little scared, trying to understand who you are.
Aah hi, my name is Vini, are you guys okay? they look worried....
Vini tried to stay calm, talking calmly and trying to be calm.
Good? this should be my question. Are you sure you're alright? You look kind of scared. How long have you been here?
Oh, I kind of don't remember but I ended up waking up just now, not sure what happened to me last night.
Last night? Have you been attacked by Elite Color?! Keep calm, I can help you!
Mysterious pony comes closer to you, offering to help you
E..Elite color? I really don't remember, and I accept the help, thank you very much.
Vini tried to remain calm, but slowly felt better as he realized the gentleness of the mysterious pony. But he was still confused and scared about what was happening. He tried to get up but failed.
I think I'll need more than help, I kind of can't walk...
Vini was very embarrassed to realize that he didn't know how to walk on four legs while answering.
Wait... can't you walk? V..Are you sure you're from here? What city do you come from? Just try to stay balanced and don't let your body weight make you lose balance.
Mysterious pony was surprised by your words, he gradually helped you to get in a balanced pose so you could stay seated.
Heck bro, I'm trying to remember and I think I remembered I was eating something and blacked out, and I came here out of nowhere.
Vini tried to balance himself between his paws as he responded.
From... From nothing?! So I'm right! You are also a new visitor from another dimension!
Vini lost the balance of the pose of the paws and fell on the sand again.
Oh... yes, I think this is more than evidence... hihi... don't worry , I teach you to walk. My name is Kenny!

during the giggles of Kenny, Kenny starts to smile at Vini and prepare to help Vini stand up again. Vini felt even better about Kenny's kindness. He looked at Kenny still confused about what was happening, but he simply continued to accept the help.
Yeah hihi, thanks for the help Kenny....
Kenny felt happier wanting to keep helping Vini.

hihi... You're welcome. Just keep calm, and start walking very slowly, you need to keep balance and sync between all 4 legs. This way you'll soon learn to walk.The village is very close to here, you can rest in my house with my friend Raquel.
When we see your SmartMoby, we'll be able to help you better.
Kenny smiles again and started to help Vini during the first steps to start to walk.
What? What is a SmartMoby? I have one?

Oh? Oh sorry! hihihi... Yeah! The SmartMoby is on your arm right now. This is part of you, we all have one. It's like a phone, but actually it's a device that carries your soul and keeps you alive here.
Vini looked at his arm and was surprised. That device had now merged with his arm. It was just a screen on his arm and it was impossible to remove as it was now part of his arm.

Kenny kept helping Vini walk. The place was very calm. It looked completely deserted. Vini immediately thought it was something he had already seen somewhere. But he found it extremely strange that the ponies found were different from what he knew about ponies. Was it really the world he was thinking about or could it be just a coincidence?
Hey man, let me get my phone, as I remember, it's a device similar to that in my world, but it has other important features, like listening to music or having many books in it.
Vini looks for the phone to store the phone in somewhere.
Listen to music? I've never seen anything like this...
Kenny felt surprised and a little scared.
But alright, let me get it! Try to stay upright!
Kenny smiled and let Vini go so Vini could try to balance yourself between the 4 legs while he went to get your phone in the sand.
Okay... Fine...
This is much stranger than I imagined. Will I be stuck here forever? How are my friends and my parents doing?
Right after Kenny give the phone, Vini hold the phone.
I remember the battery and I DIDN'T TAKE THE SHIT CHARGER! WHY?!
Vini got mentally pissed off. and as soon as I see that there was no signal, Vini try to turn the phone off.
Oh? Vini? Are you okay? Is something wrong with your phone?
Kenny said with a curious face, looked at Vini and he reactions while trying to help he keep up again. Then the two started walking towards the village.

O..oh? Oh yeah, kind of the energy that makes it stay on runs out quickly so I'll only use it in cases of need because I need another part to recharge it. but yes he is normal, thanks for helping me get phone back.
Vini was worried about his phone battery. It looked like his phone was the last thing left of items from Earth. Vini's clothes had mysteriously disappeared too.
Recharge a phone? hmm... Maybe James can help you if he's willing to walk with you. He is a friend of mine who loves adventures. I believe he will be returning home soon.
Kenny spoke thoughtfully as he continued to help you walk.
Okay... Let's go... soon we'll be home!
James? But I just met you! You're crazy?!

Kenny smiled and ran forward, revealing that Vini were starting to walk alone without help, but then you started to lose he balance for a few seconds when he realized that there was no one helping he.
Oh? no no no no no!
Vini tried not to completely lose his paws balance.
At least he seems to be very silly. I see no reason why he wants to kidnap me.
Uff... About earlier, you said something about Elite Color, what would it be exactly?

Elite Color? oh! The Elite Color! Sorry, I forgot to talk about the Elite Color. Elite Color is a mysterious organization that claims to protect this world. We don't really know what they are, but sometimes they do some cruel things. They live on top of the highest mountain in Pony Driland, which is our island you're on.
Kenny then looked at Vini walking. He was surprised and very happy.
Oh? Look! By the way! You are starting to learn to walk on 4 legs! You're learning fast!
Vini giggles a little before answering. trying to be a little friendlier
You also said at the beginning, or comment in a strange way, the way you entered me and said "you also came from another dimension" are there others besides me?
Kenny Kenny spoke with a worried face.
Oh yes... The others...
Oh shit... Here comes the bad news.

All of us here come from many different dimensions.... We've been stuck here forever, we don't know how to get out of here, it's been many years since I've seen my family, and I don't remember in detail what my real body was like.
Kenny tried to be positive as he continued to explain.

I hope you don't get scared by this fact, that's the motive I was worried when I found you here. It's very dangerous for newbies to walk alone around Pony Driland. This place is very dangerous if you don't know how things work around here.
HOLY SHIT! NO! FOREVER?! Is everyone here alien?! That's what i understood?! WHY?!
Ah...
Ah? Please don't be too surprised, Raquel and I are going to help you! If you've been in good company, I'm sure you'll do fine around here.
Kenny was thoughtful, trying to calm Vini down, so he responded.

It's what we can do for Pony Driland newcomers. I'm sure you'll like your new life. Unfortunately I can't hold back your curiosities... So...if you really want to find out more about this place... You'll have to try to be friends with James...
James... Who is James? Why everyone is a alien in a pony body?! Look where I accidentally got myself into an X-Tudo! Someone save me from this nightmare... Please!
Kenny kept walking and he saw the village soon the front.
Oh! Look! We are almost there! Right in time!
Kenny smiled and started to move faster. Vini was surprised. He just looked around for a few seconds, looking for something randomly. So Vini tries to follow Kenny's speed.
H..Hey! Wait me!
Kenny arrived in the village, the village was a little busy, Vini saw some random ponies starting another new day as Kenny arrived at his door.
Kenny starts to smile and looks around looking for you.
: Oh? Vini? Vini?! Oh Vini! You are there!
Kenny smiled again and waved at Vini, happily inviting Vini to come faster.
Vini looked smiling back with a pokeface.
I'll get there. A moment...
hihihi... You're doing great! Soon you will walk better on 4 legs!
Kenny giggles a little before smiling again and kept waving at you, waiting for Vini to arrive.
Vini looked smiling back again with a second pokerface.
I'm coming... coming slowly...
Vini looked smiling back again with a second pokerface. Vini then tried a little harder, with great difficulty, but he finally arrived.
Hah! I arrived! Yes!
Vini then was very thoughtful, he looked all around and was surprised by the scenery that was being observed.
Wow There's a lot of ponies here and a lot of little houses here.

Vini slowly felt that his walking skills were getting better and better. But he could still feel uncomfortable with the whole new environment. He looked very confused and at a loss as to how all this was possible. Why was he there, how did he get there. Everything was just amazing for Vini.
hihihi... Yes. You are in Greendream Village. Be very welcome new one!
Kenny knock on the door happily.
Vini found Kenny's attitude strange, he watched and analyzed him for a few seconds curiously before asking the question.
Oh? Does this house belong to you?
Ehe! It's the house where Raquel and I live. You can feel right at home now. Uou can stay here if you need some shelter.
Kenny is a little nervous for a few seconds to answer, but then he continues with a smile while he look at the door being opened, so Vini saw Raquel.
Good morning Kenny! How's the... Oh? Um... a new guest?
Rachel spoke in a frightened way for a few seconds.
hihihi... Calm down... it's Vini. I found him on the beach where newbies spawn when they teleport here sunddely. He is here to be received! Right Vini?
Kenny spoke happily while looking at Vini.
Ah... Yes?
Yes? Yes... Hello Vini... Welcome.
Raquel looked curiously at Vini for a few seconds before answering.
My name is Raquel, nice to meet you... It's the first time I've seen a newbie visit our house.

Raquel spoke in a shy way before smiling back. Vini then tried not to scare Raquel too much and tried to respond kindly when he realized that this would be the best alternative to not being alone in the unknown world.
Pleasure, my name...well you already know. My name is Vini hihihihi. Kenny found me at the beach and brought me here, thank you very much for your consideration.

Vini smile a little more while looking around. Vini saw houses and more ponies around having their daily routine, around Vini also saw some trees around the village, and under these trees there were sticks and some pieces of leaf, stones, it was a very rich place in nature mixed with the village , and later on, there were other places like the street vendors' square and some buildings owned by those who manage the village.
Well...Make yourself at home...I...I made some pancakes for breakfast today...
Raquel continued with the shy happy face as she offered to enter. Vini then went back to listening to the conversation, surprised to hear about the meal.
Pancakes! Today is your lucky day Vini! Pancakes are the best morning meal we have here at home!

Kenny said all excited in response. Raquel was a little surprised but then she laughed a little. Vini was still confused, trying to understand all that kindness. Then he would analyze the situation again and just respond. Vini was a little nervous trying to believe Kenny.

Ahn thank you very much, but why are you helping me? You don't know me or anything like that, for example, I'm a stranger to you, don't you think it's strange for a stranger to enter your house? Even weirder that he came from another world and doesn't even know how to walk right? Doesn't it seem a little strange to you?
Kenny got a little nervous and would just respond by laughing a little to relax.

Oh? Vini don't worry, I saw in your face that you were lost. We work hard to make guests feel welcome in the village and feel comfortable here. We don't want anyone to risk the life and end up going to the dark side of Pony Driland.
So please make yourself at home. We just want to do this for your own good.
Kenny answered Vini and offered Vini to enter too. He proved to be positive in what he was doing. He wanted Vini to feel good. He just waited for Vini to enter the house.
Okay okay... I understand, so excuse me, what a beautiful house! *-*
Hihihi... Make yourself at home!
Kenny smiled and rubbed he head at Raquel face. Raquel looks at Kenny for a few seconds before smile, so Raquel rubbed her face back while the two enter the house.
Hahaha... I think I get it. they are a couple. it is cute.

Vini soon saw that it was a house mixed with a medieval style with the technological things of a modern house. Vini saw a beautiful room rich in furniture, Vini just missed some things that are normally used for communication like television and telephone. And just ahead Vini could see the table where Raquel was preparing breakfast with pancakes. So Vini waits for kenny to say something, waiting at the entrance, making Kenny look at Vini.
Oh? Vini? You may come in! Remember you are welcome here!
Kenny invited Vini to enter again as Kenny went with Raquel towards the breakfast table.
Oh? Okay. Thank you again for everything.
Vini was a little more surprised to be invited in. Vini heading towards an empty chair at the table.
Did you talk about me meeting someone to know the right place? who was it?
